title: Investors 'must challenge IOSCO' as environmental disclosure slows for listed companies
text:
End date Investors 'must challenge IOSCO' as environmental disclosure slows for listed companies 
Investors must "directly challenge" the International Organisation of Securities Commissions (IOSCO) to ramp up its sustainability efforts as figures reveal a slowdown in non-financial reporting for listed companies.
